rxjs-debugging.config.title: RxJS Debugging
rxjs-debugging.config.hideLiveLogWhenSto: When enabled, live log values are hidden automatically after stopping the debugger.
rxjs-debugging.config.showOperatorLogPoi: When enabled, recommended operator log points will be shown automatically. Hint: You can toggle this setting using the related command in the command palette as well.
rxjs-debugging.config.logLevel: Internal log level for the extension. (reload required)
rxjs-debugging.command.toggleOperatorLog: Toggle Display of Operator Log Point Recommendations
rxjs-debugging.operatorLogPointDecoratio: Log events emitted by this operator.
Stop logging events emitted by this operator.
